name: Grape Kush
description: DJ Short's Grape Kush is a productive marijuana hybrid strain that has sharp and fruity aromas. The effects are long-lasting and powerful, inducing euphoric head effects and a relaxed body.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Giggly, Euphoric, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Anxious, Paranoid, Dry Mouth
